title: Mincemeat brownies with a chocolate ganache
description: These festive brownies are a decadent dessert served with the rich chocolate ganache. They also make a great gift without the ganache - just cut into squares and wrap in cellophane.
ingredients: 190g/7oz dark chocolate (minimum 70% cocoa), broken into pieces
375g/13oz dark chocolate (minimum 70% cocoa solids), broken into pieces
